pullrequest.title: Add job template deletion to cluster/common.py and cluster/__init__.py

content.raw: Upon searching, I found that the only instantiation of the JobTemplateFactory object is for job_tmpl_factory (line 1897 of ```run.py```), which is then used to create a RestartableJob to be added to RestartableJobDict. There are no other instantiations. The job_tmpl_factory object created is also only put into the RestartableJob object (line 1911 of ```run.py```), no other objects.
content.html: Upon searching, I found that the only instantiation of the JobTemplateFactory object is for job_tmpl_factory (line 1897 of run.py), which is then used to create a RestartableJob to be added to RestartableJobDict. There are no other instantiations. The job_tmpl_factory object created is also only put into the RestartableJob object (line 1911 of run.py), no other objects.
